data.title: Who is Wiz Khalifa's girlfriend? Relationship and dating history
data.meta_description: Everyone is wondering about WIZ KHALIFA’S GIRLFRIEND as the rapper has been a bit low key about his relationships, which is quite strange. Who is he dating?
data.text:
Wiz Khalifa, an American rapper, singer, and songwriter, was only a kid when recording songs. He scored his first big hit with Black and Yellow, which catapulted him to stardom. Wiz has never gone down ever since, doing big projects and solidifying his name in the music industry's hall of fame. A lot can be said about his music career, but how much do you know about his relationship life. The rapper has had different relationships, but who is Wiz Khalifa’s girlfriend today?

Many notable personalities have had phenomenal breakthroughs in their careers, especially in the music industry, surpassing people's expectations while going for the crown. Wiz Khalifa is a big name and one among these affluent personalities. And with stardom cometh the interest in personal lives, fans wondering about the rapper's relationships.

Has the rapper finally stumbled upon the real deal after a few years of being unlucky in love? Who is Wiz Khalifa dating now?

Wiz Khalifa profile summary

Name: Cameron Jibril Thomaz

Date of birth: September 8, 1987

Age: 34 years old

Place of birth: Minot, North Dakota, the United States of America

Education: Taylor Allderdice High school

Occupation: Rapper, singer, and songwriter

Genres: Hip-hop, pop-rap, trap

Years active: 2005 – present

Labels: Taylor Gang, Atlantic, Warner Bros, Rostrum

Associated acts: BernerBig, Sean, Chevy Woods, Currensy, DJ Bonics, ID Labs, Juicy J, Mac Miller, Snoop Dogg, TM88, Ty Dolla Sign

Spouse: Amber Rose (married 2013 and divorced in 2016)

Partners: Aimee Aguilar (2019 – present)

Children: 1

Website: wizkhalifa.com

Who is Wiz Khalifa’s girlfriend?

Everyone has been wondering about Wiz Khalifa’s girlfriend. After breaking up with Amber Rose, he has had different relationships. The rapper was often spotted with a mystery woman, but fans got wind of her identity after Wiz was photographed with her, and it looked like they were serious.

That was in 2019, and until today, Wiz Khalifa has remained committed to her girlfriend, Aimee Aguilar. Aimee is an Instagram model who has made small cameos in popular shows like Impractical Jokers and Power. On top of these, she has appeared in some music videos, including Tyga's Taste, and Quavo's HOW ABOUT THAT?

Aimee is also an entrepreneur running a clothing brand called Oasis Swim. The brand sells swimwear at affordable prices of $25.

Wiz Khalifa’s dating history

Who has Wiz Khalifa dated? Even though the renowned rapper is known for being married to Amber Rose, she has dated many women over the years before finding love once again in her current relationship with Aimee Aguilar. So, who are these beautiful ladies?

Winnie Harlow

Considering the high-profile relationship, Winnie Harlow is one of the most famous wiz khalifa's girlfriends. They started dating in 2018, four years after separating from his ex-wife, Amber Rose. So, of course, the two quickly became one of Hollywood's most adorable couples.

Wiz and Winnie first sparked dating rumours when the rapper shared an image of them on Instagram along with a series of heart emojis. The post’s caption read, “Winnie & Wiz”.

Even Amber Rose approved of the relationship stating that it would be cool if Winnie Harlow became her and Khalifa’s son stepmother. Wiz and Winnie broke up in 2019, and soon after, the rapper was seen with his arms around a mystery woman.

Apryl Jones

Wiz Khalifa was rumoured to be dating Apryl Jones, famous for being Omarion's baby momma. The rapper was spotted flirting in the comments section of Apryl, who responded with kissing and winking emoji.

The communication even went further when Wiz posted a picture on his Instagram asking fans, "Who you loving?" Apryl responded with a heart emoji.

The two have never confirmed whether they dated or not, but they seemed to be quite close to each other.

Wiz Khalifa and Izabela Guedes

Wiz Khalifa dated the Brazilian model Izabela Guedes from October 2016 to February 2018. According to various reports, the Brazilian model dumped Wiz Khalifa because she suspected he was cheating on her with an ex-girlfriend.

Raven Felix

Raven Felix is an American rapper rumoured to be dating Wiz Khalifa in December 2015. However, the two never confirmed those rumours. Instead, they worked on several music projects and perhaps created a strong working relationship that fans assumed they were dating.

Indyamarie Jean

Indyamarie Jean and Wiz Khalifa were rumoured to be dating from October to December 2015. Indyamarie is a fashion model, musician, accessories designer, and media personality popular for her visual collaborations with different big brands, including Fenty PUMA by Rihanna, PUMA, Apple, Coca-Cola, and others.

Rita Ora

When was Rita Ora rumoured to be dating Wiz Khalifa? The rumours started circulating in August 2015 when the two enjoyed a late-night dinner one day after attending the Teen Choice Awards.

However, an insider stated that the two never displayed any PDA at the table but walked out of the restaurant together. They never confirmed whether they were hanging out or were dating.

Yoshii

Yoshii and Wiz Khalifa were rumoured to be dating in July 2015. Yoshii is a tattoo model from Indianapolis who linked up with the renowned rapper during the 2014 Under the Influence tour stop and were still hanging out almost a year later.

Khloe Kardashian

Did Wiz Khalifa date Khloe Kardashian? The rapper was rumoured to be involved with Khloe in February 2015. However, no one among the two ever confirmed the dating rumours, and it remains a mystery whether it happened.

Deelishis

Deelishis’ dating rumours are quite bizarre as people speculate that she dated the talented rapper in 2014 when he was still married to Amber Rose.

Amber Rose

Amber Rose is the only woman to have gained the title of Wiz Khalifa's wife as they were married for one year. Amber and Wiz met in early 2011 and started dating. They got engaged on March 1, 2012, and married on July 8, 2013. They have a son, Sebastian, who was born in 2013.

Amber and Wiz divorced in 2014, but the ex-couple are currently on friendly terms, still giving people relationship goals despite their divorce. In an interview with Playboy, Khalifa reflected on his time with Amber Rose'.

I was sad after it ended, but I wasn't depressed. I've never really been depressed in my life. I was sad because we were going through a lot, and my son was involved, and that hurt me because my main goal is to raise my son how I wanted. I'm a control freak, and not being able to control that was weird...I'm way smarter and better equipped to deal with it a year later.

Natalie Nunn

Wiz Khalifa dated Natalie Nunn from October to December 2010. Natalie Nunn is renowned for being a castmate of the fourth season of The bad Girls Club in 2019-2010. She also appeared in seasons 5 and 6.

Draya Michele

Draya Michele and Wiz Khalifa dated in 2010. Draya is an American media personality, model, socialite, actress and fashion designer. She is famous for being part of the reality television show Basketball Wives LA. She lost custody of her son when she joined the television show and was shamed as a bad mother on social media.

Quick facts about Wiz Khalifa

Does Wiz Khalifa have a girlfriend? Yes, the rapper has a girlfriend, Aimee Aguilar, dating since 2019. They have been dating low key ever since they came out publicly.

Who is Wiz Khalifa’s wife? Wiz Khalifa doesn’t have a wife but has a girlfriend. He was once married to Amber Rose.

Who is Wis Khalifa engaged to? The rapper isn't committed to anyone now, but he has a girlfriend called Aimee Aguilar.

Who is Wiz Khalifa’s ex? Wiz was married to Amber Rose, whom he divorced in 2014 and is currently his ex-wife. He had dated many other women, some rumoured since then.

Does Wiz Khalifa have a child? Wiz Khalifa has a son called Sebastian, born in 2013 during his marriage with Amber Rose.

What did Amber Rose do to Wiz Khalifa? According to Rosenberg, Amber Rose caught Wiz Khalifa in bed with twin sisters. However, Rosenberg later apologized for his comments.

Many people are interested in Wiz Khalifa’s girlfriend, considering his numerous relationships over the years. He is currently dating Aimee Aguilar, as there haven't been any rumours of the rapper dating anyone else since making their relationship public.

Are you looking for more information about Olivia Rodrigo’s dating history? Tuko.co.ke featured an informative article about the singer's relationship life. Her songs have catapulted her to popularity, making people interested in her personal life.

The songwriter has been in different relationships over the years. So, who has he dated before and is she currently in a relationship?

Source: TUKO.co.ke
